Class AbstractSegmentParser

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment.AbstractStructureParser
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment.AbstractSegmentParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Processor<ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message,ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DSCParser, ERRParser, EVNParser, MRGParser, MSAParser, MSHParser, NK1Parser, OBRParser, OBXParser, ORCParser, PD1Parser, PIDParser, PV1Parser, QAKParser, QIDParser, QPDParser, RCPParser, RXAParser, RXRParser
public abstract class AbstractSegmentParser extends AbstractStructureParser implements Processor<ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message,ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment>
A SegmentParser parses segments of the specified type.

    • parse

      public org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase parse(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment)
      Annotation driven parsing. Call this method to use parsing driven by ComesFrom and Produces annotations in the parser. This method will be called by MessageParser for each segment of the given type that appears within the method. It will create the primary resource produced by the parser (by calling the setup() method) and then parses individual fields of the segment and passes them to parser methods to add them to the primary resource or to create any extra resources.
      Specified by:
      parse in interface Processor<ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message,ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment>
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to be parsed
      Returns:
      the constructed FHIR Resource or data type
